===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=がいらいご|外来|tr1=gairai|t1=foreign, coming in from outside|語|tr2=go|t2=language, word}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|がいらいご|y=o|acc=h|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|がいらいご|hhira=ぐわいらいご|kyu=外來語}}

# a foreign [[loanword]] [[transliterate]]d into Japanese, usually written in ''[[katakana]]''
#: {{ja-usex|「ググる」とは'''外来語'''だ。|「ググる」 と は '''がいらいご''' だ。|"To google" is a '''foreign loanword'''.}}

====Usage notes====
Although this technically refers to a loanword from anywhere, it usually refers to loanwords from the West.
